game.name: Welcome To My Domain
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ever wondered what it’s like to be chased by a dominant yandere demon? Well, this is the game! Welcome To My Domain is a psychological horror game with a unique retro-anime visual style, where you solve puzzles to escape the demon’s clutches.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ever wondered what it’s like to be chased by a dominant yandere demon? Well, this is the game! Welcome To My Domain is a psychological horror game with a unique retro-anime visual style, where you solve puzzles to escape the demon’s clutches.
